app-container.ariaLabel: Select the first item, then the second item to match. One of the item will be moved and checked for a correct match

app-text.string: Match the picture of the sense organs to their functions

This activity features a set of three images representing an eye, an ear, and a nose. The task for students is to choose the words to the correct pictures by double tapping the right answer. Below these images are the words "smell," "hear," and "see," which describe the functions of the respective sense organs.

This activity features a set of three images representing an eye, an ear, and a nose. The task for students is to choose the words to the correct pictures by double tapping the right answer.Below these images are the words "smell," "hear," and "see," which describe the functions of the respective sense organs.
This exercises helps children learn about the senses in a fun and interactive way, associating each sense with its corresponding body part.

app-container.ariaLabel: Select the first item, then the second item to match. One of the item will be moved and checked for a correct match

app-text.string: Which part of the body helps us hear a sound ?

app-col.onCorrectMatch: this.transition='all 0.5s ease'; this.transform='scale(1.2)'; this.backgroundColor='green'; element.transition='all 0.5s ease'; element.transform='scale(1.2)'; element.backgroundColor='green';this.visibility=hidden; element.visibility=hidden;

this.transition='all 0.5s ease'; this.transform='scale(1.2)'; this.backgroundColor='green'; element.transition='all 0.5s ease'; element.transform='scale(1.2)'; element.backgroundColor='green';this.visibility=hidden; element.visibility=hidden;

this.transition='all 0.5s ease'; this.transform='scale(1.2)'; this.backgroundColor='green'; element.transition='all 0.5s ease'; element.transform='scale(1.2)'; element.backgroundColor='green';this.visibility=hidden; element.visibility=hidden;
